item.title: One of London's most popular arts attractions is crumbling and needs a $200 million fix
item.description: The Southbank Centre in London needs more than $200 million to repair its concert halls and gallery as it heads toward its 75-year anniversary.

item.title: EU warns Apple it must open its iPhone operating system to rival developers
item.description: The EU said Apple must make sure devices made by rivals work with its iPhones and iOS operating systems in accordance with the Digital Markets Act

item.title: Fed slashes interest rates by a half point, an aggressive start to its first easing campaign in four years
item.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday lowered the federal funds rate to a range between 4.75%-5%.

item.title: Lunar company Intuitive Machines' stock jumps more than 40% after NASA moon satellite contract
item.description: NASA said the company was the sole awardee for a "lunar relay systems" contract, which has a maximum total value of $4.82 billion over five years.
